title: santatam ennai rakSippAi
sahitya:
santatam ennai rakSippAi undan pAdAra vindattai vandippEn anudinamum cintippEn


anupallavi

  sArasAkSi en manO vicArattait-tIrkka mighavum bhAramA un kaDaikkaN pArammA


caraNam 1    mEdiniyil unnaippOl vEru deivam uNDO shol param jyOtiyE evarkkum anAdiyE
    caraNam 2    manamariyA mUDarai tAnE tudikkak-kAraNam EnammA un perumai tAnammA
    caraNam 3    nAda rUpiNi vINA vinOdini kAmAkSi ennai Adari shyAmakrSNa sOdari dEvI
